description_html: The Kyoto Collection is a new collaboration between Sun Valley Bronze & De Reus Architects. The Zen - inspired aesthetic of wabi sabi has guided the design in Kyoto for many centuries. In this ideal, the principles of both aesthetics and functionality motivate the designs of gardens, building and products. The result is often an elegant simplicity that is timeless. De Reus Architects pays their respect to this design philosophy of restraint and beauty by calling the this new line of hardware, The Kyoto Collection.
